content:
I don't have personal opinions, but i can provide you with the following information.

the use of cgi in the walking dead was initially met with some backlash from fans who preferred the practical effects that were used in the earlier seasons. some viewers felt that the makeup and practical effects made the walkers look more realistic and terrifying, while the cgi often made them look less impressive and less scary.

furthermore, some fans criticized the over-reliance of the show on cgi and special effects, arguing that it detracted from the show's overall tone and atmosphere.

despite these criticisms, many fans also appreciated the show's use of cgi to create larger hordes of walkers and to depict more elaborate and intense action sequences. the use of cgi enabled the show to depict scenes that would have been impossible to achieve with practical effects, and many viewers appreciated the enhanced visual effects that the technology provided.

overall, the use of cgi in the walking dead had both positive and negative responses from fans, with some praising its use and others criticizing it for detracting from the overall atmosphere of the show.
